markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Hobgoblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=757)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 316 <sup>1.1</sup>

A creature with this trait is a tall, militaristic goblinoid. [Hobgoblins](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=78) tend to have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by hobgoblins. An item with this trait is created and used by hobgoblins.
name: Hobgoblin
